title: Looking for a pulpy brush typeface as found on "Turok, Son of Stone" comic book
content:
Ooooh....scary! Or, action-packed! However you describe it I love the typeface that spells “Turok” here.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091218080733im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/200706181622_3424.jpg)

Can anyone point me to some digital typeface that look like this? Preferably with an italic?
author: toog

comments.content: Good timing. Die Typonauten just released [B-Movie Retro](http://web.archive.org/web/20091218080733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typonauten/b-movie-retro/?refby=typographica).

Thanks everyone! Monster Mash and B-Movie are really close to what I want but I’m beginning to think I might have to custom-build some letters for this project. I need something in the spirit of Turok but “happier”.
